link_desc:
This is template created using idea by Alois Zadražil https://share.zabbix.com/operating-systems/windows/template-rdp-users

I have ad some functionality and mortification to this template.

there are 3 items and one Dashboard.

Logged Users - listing of logged users including name, idle time, and last login time/date

Unlogged Users - listing of unlogged users only names

RDP Users amount - number of logges users

Dashboard includes , list of logged users, list of unlogged users, and graph of amount of logged users

You have to check:

1. zabbix agent installation path and eventually correct UserParameter

2. use command query user and if State is not Active or Disc You have to correct this words in cmd scripts according to your system language
author: Marek Dyjor
